articles.author: MIKE STOBBE, CARLA K. JOHNSON
articles.title: Older Americans can get RSV vaccine this fall after speaking with their doctor, CDC says - The Associated Press
articles.description: Americans 60 and older can get a new RSV vaccine but should discuss it with their doctor first. The Centers for Disease Control and Prevention said Thursday that those eligible for the newly approved vaccines should talk with their doctor to see if it is righ…
articles.content:
Americans 60 and older can get a new RSV vaccine but should discuss it with their doctor first, U.S. health officials recommended Thursday.
The newly approved vaccines are expected to be ready in th… [+2083 chars]
